name: ddd
description: Domain-Driven Design management plugin - Introduce and maintain DDD governance for existing codebases
author: philo-kim

commands.name: analyze
commands.description: Analyze codebase and generate DDD management artifacts (.ddd.yaml, glossary.yaml, context-map.md)

commands.name: health
commands.description: Deep DDD health check - detect Anemic Models, Transaction Scripts, layer violations, and more

commands.name: glossary
commands.description: Manage Ubiquitous Language glossary - review, update, and check naming consistency

commands.name: validate
commands.description: Validate DDD principles compliance - check Aggregate boundaries, domain isolation, and patterns

commands.name: refactor
commands.description: Get refactoring guides for DDD improvements - Anemic to Rich Model, God Class splitting, etc.
